prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a living mountain with fiery accents.
I want a Pokemon that has a sturdy, rock-like body, adorned with glowing red features.
Generate a creature that embodies the strength of earth and the ferocity of fire.
Make a Pokemon that is both intimidating and resilient, with sharp, angular features.
Imagine a Pokemon that can control volcanic eruptions and thrives in mountainous terrains.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of stone and fire, showcasing a rugged appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that has a massive, rock-like form, with glowing elements that suggest heat.
